author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-4167] make the plugin param evaluator use project.getBasedir() instead of calculating based on project.getFile().

author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-4166] Fixing commons-cli problem with plugins forced to use the same version the core uses; updating assembly plugin version to latest release; adding (commented) configuration for debugging the bootstrap maven execution; and, adding embedder.stop() call in a finally block in the MavenCli.main() method to clean up for IDEs, etc.

author: jorton
msg: (apr_xml_parser_create): Install handler to prevent expansion of
internal entities with expat 1.x, and to fail on an entity
